issue.title: raider.io
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://raider.io/liberation-of-undermine/realm-rankings/world/all/mythic/0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fraider.io%2Fliberation-of-undermine%2Frealm-rankings%2Fworld%2Fall%2Fmythic%2F0) ### Comment > Cannot click the "next" button when AdGuard is enabled. > > Also, when I browse to this website with a clean cache, the cookie popup in the middle of the screen and cookie banner at the bottom of the screen show for ~5 seconds before they are removed. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/60unr1wksp44ww0gkww0o0408wgkswwtllqv70yozk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ae3kv2233io88owocg4cc8gwcsckkk4gxjb87cbiu8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | Extension System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion
